stimulusHtml: Which of the work’s elements contributes most to the illusion of spatial depth in the image?

features.html: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art / Image Source © Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: The top of the wave, because of its placement at the top of the composition
The mountain, because of its small size in relation to the other objects
The blue color, because of its contrast with the other, more neutral colors
The fishing boats, because of the way they echo the shape of the wave
